narrative: Refined QuadrantityReflection with configurable delimiter and structured ledger output for LedgerEntry integration. Removed pnpm-lock file.
purpose: Align reflection logging with LedgerEntry format and declutter repo
user_input: Ensure packages/components/nodes/agentflow/QuadrantityReflection/  works fine, go over any related code and advance the component.  See how it could relate to existing components by its purpose and enhance it
scene: Before: reflections joined with static delimiter and minimal ledger info. After: delimiter choice, ledger with agents and narrative, and lock file removed.
